Name: hin-suhelfarooqkhan-la
Author: Suhel Farooq Khan And Saifur Rahman Nadwi

Translations.Text: ye log aapas mein kis cheez ka haal poochhate hain
ek badee khabar ka haal
jisamen log ekhtelaaph kar rahe hain
dekho unhen anaqareeb hee maaloom ho jaega
phir inhen anaqareeb hee zaroor maaloom ho jaega
kya hamane zameen ko bichhauna
aur pahaadon ko (zameen) kee mekhe nahin banaaya
aur hamane tum logon ko joda joda paida kiya
aur tumhaaree neend ko aaraam (ka bais) qaraar diya
aur raat ko parada banaaya
aur ham hee ne din ko (kasab) maaash (ka vakt) banaaya
aur tumhaare oopar saat mazaboot (aasamaan) banae
aur ham hee ne (sooraj) ko raushan chiraag banaaya
aur ham hee ne baadalon se moosalaadhaar paanee barasaaya
taaki usake zarie se daane aur sabazee
aur ghane ghane baag paida karen
beshak phaisale ka din muqarrar hai
jis din soor phoonka jaega aur tum log giroh giroh haazir hoge
aur aasamaan khol die jaenge
to (usamen) daravaaze ho jaenge aur pahaad (apanee jagah se) chalae jaenge to ret hokar rah jaenge
beshak jahannum ghaat mein hai
sarakashon ka (vahee) thikaana hai
usamen muddaton pade jheenkate rahengen
na vahaan thandak ka maza chakhenge aur na khaulate hue paanee
aur bahatee huee peep ke siva kuchh peene ko milega
(ye unakee kaarastaaniyon ka) poora poora badala hai
beshak ye log aakherat ke hisaab kee ummeed hee na rakhate the
aur in logo hamaaree aayaton ko buree tarah jhuthalaaya
aur hamane har cheez ko likh kar manazabat kar rakha hai
to ab tum maza chakho hamato tum par azaab hee badhaate jaenge
beshak parahezagaaron ke lie badee kaamayaabee hai
(yaani behasht ke) baag aur angoor
aur vah auraten jinakee uthatee huee javaaniyaan
aur baaham hamajoliyaan hain aur sharaab ke labarez saagar
aur sharaab ke labarez saagar vahaan na behooda baat sunenge aur na jhooth
(ye) tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraph se kaafee inaam aur sila hai
jo saare aasamaan aur zameen aur jo in donon ke beech mein hai sabaka maalik hai bada meharabaan logon ko usase baat ka poora na hoga
jis din jibareel aur pharishte (usake saamane) par baandh kar khade honge (us din) usase koee baat na kar sakega magar jise khuda ijaazat de aur vah thikaane kee baat kahe
vah din barahaq hai to jo shakhsh chaahe apane paravaradigaar kee baaragaah mein (apana) thikaana banae
hamane tum logon ko anaqareeb aane vaale azaab se dara diya jis din aadamee apane haathon pahale se bheje hue (aamaal) ko dekhega aur kaafir kahega kaash main khaak ho jaata
un (farishton) kee qasam
jo (kuphfaar kee rooh) doob kar sakhtee se kheench lete hain
aur unakee qasam jo (momineen kee jaan) aasaanee se khol dete hain
aur unakee qasam jo (aasamaan zameen ke daramiyaan) pairate phirate hain
phir ek ke aage badhate hain
phir (duniya ke) intazaam karate hain (unakee qasam) ki qayaamat ho kar rahegee
jis din zameen ko bhoochaal aaega phir usake peechhe aur zalazala aaega
us din dilon ko dhadakan hogee
unakee onkhen (nidaamat se) jhukee huee hongee
kuphfaar kahate hain ki kya ham ulate paanv (zindagee kee taraf) phir lautenge
kya jab ham khokhal haddiyaan ho jaenge
kahate hain ki ye lautana to bada nuqasaan deh hai
vah (qayaamat) to (goya) bas ek sakht cheekh hogee
aur log shaq baaragee ek maidaan (hashr) mein maujood honge
(ai rasool) kya tumhaare paas moosa ka kissa bhee pahuncha hai
jab unako paravaradigaar ne toova ke maidaan mein pukaara
ki phiraun ke paas jao vah sarakash ho gaya hai
(aur usase) kaho ki kya teree khvaahish hai ki (kuphr se) paak ho jae
aur main tujhe tere paravaradigaar kee raah bata doon to tujhako khauph (paida) ho
garaz moosa ne use (asa ka bada) maujiza dikhaaya
to usane jhuthala diya aur na maana
phir peeth pher kar (khilaaf kee) tadabeer karane laga
phir (logon ko) jama kiya aur buland aavaaz se chillaaya
to kahane laga main tum logon ka sabase bada paravaradigaar hoon
to khuda ne use duniya aur aakherat (donon) ke azaab mein giraphtaar kiya
beshak jo shakhsh (khuda se) dare usake lie is (kisse) mein ibarat hai
bhala tumhaara paida karana jyaada mushkil hai ya aasamaan ka
ki usee ne usako banaaya usakee chhat ko khoob ooncha rakha
phir use duroost kiya aur usakee raat ko taareek banaaya aur (din ko) usakee dhoop nikaalee
aur usake baad zameen ko phailaaya
usee mein se usaka paanee aur usaka chaara nikaala
aur pahaadon ko usamen gaad diya
(ye sab saamaan) tumhaare aur tumhaare chaarapaayo ke faayade ke lie hai
to jab badee sakht museebat (qayaamat) aa maujood hogee
jis din insaan apane kaamon ko kuchh yaad karega
aur jahannum dekhane vaalon ke saamane zaahir kar dee jaegee
to jisane (duniya mein) sar uthaaya tha
aur duniyaavee zindagee ko tarajeeh dee thee
usaka thikaana to yaqeenan dozakh hai
magar jo shakhsh apane paravaradigaar ke saamane khade hone se darata aur jee ko naajaayaz khvaahishon se rokata raha
to usaka thikaana yaqeenan behasht hai
(ai rasool) log tum se qayaamat ke baare mein poochhate hain
ki usaka kaheen thal beda bhee hai
to tum usake zikr se kis fikr mein ho
us (ke ilm) kee inteha tumhaare paravaradigaar hee tak hai to tum bas jo usase dare usako daraane vaale ho
jis din vah log isako dekhenge to (samajhenge ki duniya mein) bas ek shaam ya subah thahare the
vah apanee baat par cheen ba jabeen ho gaya
aur munh pher baitha ki usake paas naabeena aa gaya
aur tumako kya maaloom yaayad vah (taaleem se) paakeezagee haasil karata
ya vah naseehat sunata to naseehat usake kaam aatee
to jo kuchh paravaah nahin karata
usake to tum darapai ho jaate ho haaloki agar vah na sudhare
to tum zimmedaar nahin
aur jo tumhaare paas lapakata hua aata hai
aur (khuda se) darata hai
to tum usase berookhee karate ho
dekho ye (quraan) to saraasar naseehat hai
to jo chaahe ise yaad rakhe
(lauhe mahaphooz ke) bahut moazazij auraaq mein (likha hua) hai
buland marataba aur paak hain
(aise) likhane vaalon ke haathon mein hai
jo buzurg nekokaar hain
insaan halaak ho jae vah kya kaisa naashukra hai
(khuda ne) use kis cheez se paida kiya
nutphe se use paida kiya phir usaka andaaza muqarrar kiya
phir usaka raasta aasaan kar diya
phir use maut dee phir use kabr mein dafan karaaya
phir jab chaahega utha khada karega
sach to yah hai ki khuda ne jo hukm use diya usane usako poora na kiya
to insaan ko apane ghaate hee taraph gaur karana chaahie
ki ham hee ne (baadal) se paanee barasaaya
phir ham hee ne zameen (darakht ugaakar) cheeree phaadee
phir hamane usamen anaaj ugaaya
aur angoor aur tarakaariyaan
aur zaitoon aur khajooren
aur ghane ghane baag aur meve
aur chaara (ye sab kuchh) tumhaare aur tumhaare
chaarapaayon ke phaayade ke lie (banaaya)
to jab kaanon ke parade phaadane vaalee (qayaamat) aa maujood hogee
us din aadamee apane bhaee
aur apanee maan aur apane baap
aur apane ladake baalon se bhaagega
us din har shakhsh (apanee najaat kee) aisee fikr mein hoga jo usake (mashagool hone ke) lie kaafee hon
bahut se chehare to us din chamakate honge
khandaan shaandaan (yahee neko kaar hain)
aur bahut se chehare aise honge jin par gard padee hogee
us par siyaahee chhaee huee hogee
yahee kuphfaar badakaar hain
jis vakt aafataab kee chaadar ko lapet liya jaega
aur jis vakt taare gir padegen
aur jab pahaad chalae jaengen
aur jab anaqareeb janane vaalee oontaniyon bekaar kar dee jaengee
aur jis vakt vahashee jaanavar ikattha kiye jaayenge
aur jis vakt dariya aag ho jaayenge
aur jis vakt ruhen haviyon se mila dee jaengee
aur jis vakt zinda dar gor ladakee se poochha jaega
ki vah kis gunaah ke badale maaree gayee
aur jis vakt (aamaal ke) daphtar khole jaen
aur jis vakt aasamaan ka chhilaka utaara jaega
aur jab dozakh (kee aag) bhadakaayee jaegee
aur jab behisht qareeb kar dee jaegee
tab har shakhsh maaloom karega ki vah kya (aamaal) lekar aaya
to mujhe un sitaaron kee qasam jo chalate chalate peechhe hat jaate
aur gaayab hote hain
aur raat kee qasam jab khatm hone ko aae
aur subah kee qasam jab raushan ho jae
ki beshak yen (quraan) ek muaziz pharishta (jibareel kee zabaan ka paigaam hai)
jo bade qavee arsh ke maalik kee baaragaah mein buland rutaba hai
vahaan (sab pharishton ka) saradaar amaanatadaar hai
aur (makke vaalon) tumhaare saathee mohammad deevaane nahin hain
aur beshak unhonen jibareel ko (aasamaan ke) khule (sharaqee) kinaare par dekha hai
aur vah gaib kee baaton ke zaahir karane mein bakheel nahin
aur na yah maradood shaitaan ka qaul hai
phir tum kahaan jaate ho
ye saare jahon ke logon ke lie bas naseehat hai
(magar) usee ke lie jo tumamen seedhee raah chale
aur tum to saare jahon ke paalane vaale khuda ke chaahe bagair kuchh bhee chaah nahin sakate
jab aasamaan tarkh jaega
aur jab taare jhad padenge
aur jab dariya bah (kar ek doosare se mil) jaenge
aur jab kabren ukhaad dee jaengee
tab har shakhsh ko maaloom ho jaega ki usane aage kya bheja tha aur peechhe kya chhoda tha
ai insaan tumhen apane paravaradigaar ke baare mein kis cheez ne dhoka diya
jisane tujhe paida kiya to tujhe duroost banaaya aur munaasib aaza die
aur jis soorat mein usane chaaha tere jod band milae
haan baat ye hai ki tum log jaza (ke din) ko jhuthalaate ho
haaloki tum par nigehabaan muqarrar hain
burzug log (pharishte sab baaton ko) likhane vaale (keraaman qaatebeen)
jo kuchh tum karate ho vah sab jaanate hain
beshak neko kaar (behisht kee) neamaton mein honge
aur badakaar log yaqeenan jahannum mein jaza ke din
usee mein jhonke jaenge
aur vah log usase chhup na sakenge
aur tumhen kya maaloom ki jaza ka din kya hai
phir tumhen kya maaloom ki jaza ka din kya cheez hai
us din koee shakhsh kisee shakhsh kee bhalaee na kar sakega aur us din hukm sirph khuda hee ka hoga
naap taul mein kamee karane vaalon kee kharaabee hai
jo auren se naap kar len to poora poora len
aur jab unakee naap ya taul kar den to kam kar den
kya ye log itana bhee khyaal nahin karate
ki ek bade (sakht) din (qayaamat) mein uthae jaenge
jis din tamaam log saare jahaann ke paravaradigaar ke saamane khade honge
sun rakho ki badakaaron ke naam e amaal sijjeen mein hain
tumako kya maaloom sijjeen kya cheez hai
ek likha hua dafatar hai jisamen shayaateen ke (aamaal darj hain)
us din jhuthalaane vaalon kee kharaabee hai
jo log roje zaza ko jhuthalaate hain
haaloki usako had se nikal jaane vaale gunaahagaar ke siva koee nahin jhuthalaata
jab usake saamane hamaaree aayaten padhee jaatee hain to kahata hai ki ye to agalon ke aphasaane hain
nahin nahin baat ye hai ki ye log jo aamaal (bad) karate hain unaka unake dilon par jang baith gaya hai
beshak ye log us din apane paravaradigaar (kee rahamat se) rok die jaenge
phir ye log zaroor jahannum vaasil honge
phir unase kaha jaega ki ye vahee cheez to hai jise tum jhuthalaaya karate the
ye bhee sun rakho ki neko ke naam e amaal illeeyeen mein honge
aur tumako kya maaloom ki illeeyeen kya hai vah ek likha hua dafatar hai
jisamen nekon ke aamaal darj hain
usake paas muqarrib (farishte) haazir hain
beshak nek log neamaton mein honge
takhton par baithe nazaare karenge
tum unake cheharon hee se raahat kee taazagee maaloom kar loge
unako sar ba mohar khaalis sharaab pilaayee jaegee
jisakee mohar mishk kee hogee aur usakee taraph alabatta shaayaqeen ko ragabat karanee chaahie
aur us (sharaab) mein tasaneem ke paanee kee aamezish hogee
vah ek chashma hai jisamen muqarebeen piyenge
beshak jo gunaahagaar mominon se hansee kiya karate the
aur jab unake paas se guzarate to un par chashamak karate the
aur jab apane ladake vaalon kee taraf laut kar aate the to itaraate hue
aur jab un momineen ko dekhate to kah baithate the ki ye to yaqeenee gumaraah hain
haaloki ye log un par kuchh nigaraan bana ke to bheje nahin gae the
to aaj (qayaamat mein) eemaanadaar log kaafiron se hansee karenge
(aur) takhton par baithe nazaare karenge
ki ab to kaafiron ko unake kie ka poora poora badala mil gaya
jab aasamaan phat jaega
aur apane paravaradigaar ka hukm baja laega aur use vaajib bhee yahee hai
aur jab zameen (baraabar karake) taan dee jaegee
aur jo kuchh usamen hai ugal degee aur bilkul khaalee ho jaegee
aur apane paravaradigaar ka hukm baja laegee
aur us par laazim bhee yahee hai (to qayaamat aa jaegee) ai insaan too apane paravaradigaar kee huzooree kee koshish karata hai
to too (ek na ek din) usake saamane haazir hoga phir (us din) jisaka naamae aamaal usake daahine haath mein diya jaega
usase to hisaab aasaan tareeke se liya jaega
aur (phir) vah apane (momineen ke) qabeele kee taraph khush khush palatega
lekin jis shakhsh ko usaka naame aamal usakee peeth ke peechhe se diya jaega
vah to maut kee dua karega
aur jahannum vaasil hoga
ye shakhsh to apane ladake baalon mein mast rahata tha
aur samajhata tha ki kabhee (khuda kee taraph) phir kar jaega hee nahin
haan usaka paravaradigaar yaqeenee usako dekh bhaal kar raha hai
to mujhe shaam kee murkhee kee qasam
aur raat kee aur un cheezon kee jinhen ye dhaank letee hai
aur chaand kee jab poora ho jae
ki tum log zaroor ek sakhtee ke baad doosaree sakhtee mein phansoge
to un logon ko kya ho gaya hai ki eemaan nahin eemaan nahin laate
aur jab unake saamane quraan padha jaata hai to (khuda ka) sajada nahin karate (21) (sajada)
balki kaafir log to (aur use) jhuthalaate hain
aur jo baaten ye log apane dilon mein chhipaate hain khuda use khoob jaanata hai
to (ai rasool) unhen dardanaak azaab kee khushakhabaree de do
magar jo log eemaan lae aur unhonne achchhe achchhe kaam kie unake lie beintiha ajr (va savaab hai)
burzon vaale aasamaanon kee qasam
aur us din kee jisaka vaayada kiya gaya hai
aur gavaah kee aur jisakee gavaahee de jaegee
usakee (ki kuphfaar makka halaak hue) jis tarah khandaq vaale halaak kar die gae
jo khandaqen aag kee theen
jisamen (unhonne musalamaanon ke lie) eendhan jhonk rakha tha
jab vah un (khandaqon) par baithe hue aur jo sulook eemaanadaaron ke saath karate the usako saamane dekh rahe the
aur unako momineen kee yahee baat buree maaloom huee ki vah log khuda par eemaan lae the jo zabaradast aur sazaavaar hamd hai
vah (khuda) jisakee saare aasamaan zameen mein baadashaahat hai aur khuda har cheez se vaaqif hai
beshak jin logon ne eemaanadaar mardon aur auraton ko takaleephen deen phir tauba na kee unake lie jahannum ka azaab to hai hee (isake alaava) jalane ka bhee azaab hoga
beshak jo log eemaan lae aur achchhe kaam karate rahe unake lie vah baagaat hain jinake neeche naharen jaaree hain yahee to badee kaamayaabee hai
beshak tumhaare paravaradigaar kee pakad bahut sakht hai
vahee pahalee dafa paida karata hai aur vahee dobaara (qayaamat mein zinda) karega
aur vahee bada bakhshane vaala mohabbat karane vaala hai
arsh ka maalik bada aaleeshaan hai
jo chaahata hai karata hai
kya tumhaare paas lashakaron kee khabar pahunchee hai
(yaani) phiraun va samood kee (zaroor pahunchee hai)
magar kuphfaar to jhuthalaane hee (kee fikr) mein hain
aur khuda unako peechhe se ghere hue hai (ye jhuthalaane ke qaabil nahin)
balki ye to quraan majeed hai
jo lauhe mahaphooz mein likha hua hai
aasamaan aur raat ko aane vaale kee qasam
aur tumako kya maaloom raat ko aane vaala kya hai
(vah) chamakata hua taara hai
(is baat kee qasam) ki koee shakhsh aisa nahin jis par nigehabaan muqarrar nahin
to insaan ko dekhana chaahie ki vah kis cheez se paida hua hain
vah uchhalate hue paanee (manee) se paida hua hai
jo peeth aur seene kee haddiyon ke beech mein se nikalata hai
beshak khuda usake dobaara (paida) karane par zaroor kudarat rakhata hai
jis din dilon ke bhed jaanche jaenge
to (us din) usaka na kuchh zor chalega aur na koee madadagaar hoga
chakkar (khaane) vaale aasamaan kee qasam
aur phatane vaalee (zameen kee qasam)
beshak ye quraan qaule faisal hai
aur lago nahin hai
beshak ye kuphfaar apanee tadabeer kar rahe hain
aur main apanee tadbeer kar raha hoon
to kaafiron ko mohalat do bas unako thodee see mohalat do
ai rasool apane aaleeshaan paravaradigaar ke naam kee tasbeeh karo
jisane (har cheez ko) paida kiya
aur duroost kiya aur jisane (usaka) andaaza muqarrar kiya phir raah bataayee
aur jisane (haivaanaat ke lie) chaara ugaaya
phir khushk use siyaah rang ka kooda kar diya
ham tumhen (aisa) padha denge ki kabhee bhoolo hee nahin
magar jo khuda chaahe (mansookh kar de) beshak vah khulee baat ko bhee jaanata hai aur chhupe hue ko bhee
aur ham tumako aasaan tareeke kee taufeeq denge
to jahaan tak samajhaana mufeed ho samajhate raho
jo khauph rakhata ho vah to phauree samajh jaega
aur badabakht usase pahaloo tahee karega
jo (qayaamat mein) badee (tez) aag mein daakhil hoga
phir na vahaan marega hee na jeeyega
vah yaqeenan muraad dilee ko pahuncha jo (shirk se) paak ho
aur apane paravaradigaar ka zikr karata aur namaaz padhata raha
magar tum log duniyaavee zindagee ko tarajeeh dete ho
haaloki aakhorat kaheen behatar aur der pa hai
beshak yahee baat agale saheefon
ibaraaheem aur moosa ke saheefon mein bhee hai
bhala tumako dhaanp lene vaalee museebat (qayaamat) ka haal maalum hua hai
us din bahut se chehare zaleel roosava honge
(tauq va janzeer se) mayakqat karane vaale
thake maande dahakatee huee aag mein daakhil honge
unhen ek khaulate hue chashamen ka paanee pilaaya jaega
khaaradaar jhaadee ke siva unake lie koee khaana nahin
jo motaee paida kare na bhookh mein kuchh kaam aaega
(aur) bahut se chehare us din taro taaza honge
apanee koshish (ke nateeje) par shaadamaan
ek aaleeshaan baag mein
vahaan koee lago baat sunenge hee nahin
usamen chashmen jaaree hongen
usamen oonche oonche takht bichhe honge
aur (unake kinaare) gilaas rakhe honge
aur gaanv takie qataar kee qataar lage honge
aur nafees masanade bichhee huee
to kya ye log oont kee tarah gaur nahin karate ki kaisa ajeeb paida kiya gaya hai
aur aasamaan kee taraph ki kya buland banaaya gaya hai
aur pahaadon kee taraf ki kis tarah khade kie gae hain
aur zameen kee taraph ki kis tarah bichhaayee gayee hai
to tum naseehat karate raho tum to bas naseehat karane vaale ho
tum kuchh un par daroga to ho nahin
haan jisane munh pher liya
aur na maana to khuda usako bahut bade azaab kee saza dega
beshak unako hamaaree taraf laut kar aana hai
phir unaka hisaab hamaare zimme hai
subah kee qasam
aur das raaton kee
aur zupht va taaq kee
aur raat kee jab aane lage
aklamand ke vaaste to zaroor badee qasam hai (ki kuphfaar par zaroor azaab hoga)
kya tumane dekha nahin ki tumhaare aad ke saath kya kiya
yaani iram vaale daraaz qad
jinaka misal tamaam (duniya ke) shaharon mein koee paida hee nahin kiya gaya
aur samood ke saath (kya kiya) jo vaadee (qara) mein patthar taraash kar ghar banaate the
aur phiraun ke saath (kya kiya) jo (saza ke lie) mekhe rakhata tha
ye log mukhatalif shaharon mein sarakash ho rahe the
aur unamen bahut se fasaad phaila rakhe the
to tumhaare paravaradigaar ne un par azaab ka koda lagaaya
beshak tumhaara paravaradigaar taak mein hai
lekin insaan jab usako usaka paravaradigaar (is tarah) aazamaata hai ki usako ijzat va neamat deta hai, to kahata hai ki mere paravaradigaar ne mujhe ijzat dee hai
magar jab usako (is tarah) aazamaata hai ki us par rozee ko tang kar deta hai bol uthata hai ki mere paravaradigaar ne mujhe zaleel kiya
haragiz nahin balki tum log na yateem kee khaatiradaaree karate ho
aur na mohataaj ko khaana khilaane kee tarageeb dete ho
aur meeraara ke maal (halaal va haraam) ko samet kar chakh jaate ho
aur maal ko bahut hee azeez rakhate ho
sun rakho ki jab zameen koot koot kar reza reza kar dee jaegee
aur tumhaare paravaradigaar ka hukm aur farishte kataar ke kataar aa jaenge
aur us din jahannum saamane kar dee jaegee us din insaan chaunkega magar ab chaunkana kahaan (faayada dega)
(us vakt) qahega ki kaash maine apanee (is) zindagee ke vaaste kuchh pahale bheja hota
to us din khuda aisa azaab karega ki kisee ne vaisa azaab na kiya hoga
aur na koee usake jakadane kee tarah jakadega
(aur kuchh logon se kahega) ai itmenaan paane vaalee jaan
apane paravaradigaar kee taraf chal too usase khush vah tujh se raazee
to mere (khaas) bandon mein shaamil ho ja
aur mere behisht mein daakhil ho ja
mujhe is shahar (makka) kee kasam
aur tum isee shahar mein to rahate ho
aur (tumhaare) baap (aadam) aur usakee aulaad kee qasam
hamane insaan ko mashakqat mein (rahane vaala) paida kiya hai
kya vah ye samajhata hai ki us par koee kaaboo na pa sakega
vah kahata hai ki maine alagaaron maal uda diya
kya vah ye khyaal rakhata hai ki usako kisee ne dekha hee nahin
kya hamane use donon onkhen aur zabaan
aur donon lab nahin die (zaroor die)
aur usako (achchhee buree) donon raahen bhee dikha deen
phir vah ghaatee par se hokar (kyon) nahin guzara
aur tumako kya maaloom ki ghaatee kya hai
kisee (kee) gardan ka (gulaamee ya karj se) chhudaana
ya bhookh ke din rishtedaar yateem ya khaakasaar
mohataaj ko
khaana khilaana
phir to un logon mein (shaamil) ho jaata jo eemaan lae aur sabr kee naseehat aur taras khaane kee vaseeyat karate rahe
yahee log khush naseeb hain
aur jin logon ne hamaaree aayaton se inkaar kiya hai yahee log badabakht hain
ki unako aag mein daal kar har taraph se band kar diya jaega
sooraj kee qasam aur usakee raushanee kee
aur chaand kee jab usake peechhe nikale
aur din kee jab use chamaka de
aur raat kee jab use dhaank le
aur aasamaan kee aur jisane use banaaya
aur zameen kee jisane use bichhaaya
aur jaan kee aur jisane use duroost kiya
phir usakee badakaaree aur parahezagaaree ko use samajha diya
(qasam hai) jisane us (jaan) ko (ganaah se) paak rakha vah to kaamayaab hua
aur jisane use (gunaah karake) daba diya vah naamuraad raha
qaum masood ne apanee sarakashee se (saaleh paigambar ko) jhuthalaaya
jab unamen ka ek bada badabakht uth khada hua
to khuda ke rasool (saaleh) ne unase kaha ki khuda kee oontanee aur usake paanee peene se taarruz na karana
magar un logon paigambar ko jhuthalaaya aur usakee koonche kaat daalee to khuda ne unake gunaahon sabab se un par azaab naazil kiya phir (halaak karake) baraabar kar diya
aur usako unake badale ka koee khauph to hai nahin
raat kee qasam jab (sooraj ko) chhipa le
aur din kee qasam jab khoob raushan ho
aur us (zaat) kee jisane nar va maada ko paida kiya
ki beshak tumhaaree koshish tarah tarah kee hai
to jisane sakhaavat kee aur achchhee baat (islaam) kee tasdeeq kee
to ham usake lie raahat va aasaanee
(jannat) ke asabaab muhayya kar denge
aur jisane bukhl kiya, aur beparavaee kee
aur achchhee baat ko jhuthalaaya
to ham use sakhtee (jahannum) mein pahuncha denge
aur jab vah halaak hoga to usaka maal usake kuchh bhee kaam na aaega
hamen raah dikha dena zaroor hai
aur aakherat aur duniya (donon) khaas hamaaree cheeze hain
to hamane tumhen bhadakatee huee aag se dara diya
usamen bas vahee daakhil hoga jo bada badabakht hai
jisane jhuthalaaya aur munh pher liya aur jo bada parahezagaar hai
vah usase bacha liya jaega
jo apana maal (khuda kee raah) mein deta hai taaki paak ho jae
aur lutph ye hai ki kisee ka us par koee ehasaan nahin jisaka use badala diya jaata hai
balki (vah to) sirph apane aaleeshaan paravaradigaar kee khushanoodee haasil karane ke lie (deta hai)
aur vah anaqareeb bhee khush ho jaega
(ai rasool) pahar din chadhe kee qasam
aur raat kee jab (cheezon ko) chhupa le
ki tumhaara paravaradigaar na tumako chhod baitha aur (na tumase) naaraaz hua
aur tumhaare vaaste aakherat duniya se yaqeenee kaheen behatar hai
aur tumhaara paravaradigaar anaqareeb is qadar ata karega ki tum khush ho jao
kya usane tumhen yateem paakar (aboo taalib kee) panaah na dee (zaroor dee)
aur tumako ehakaam se naavaakif dekha to manzile maqasood tak pahuncha diya
aur tumako tangadast dekhakar ganee kar diya
to tum bhee yateem par sitam na karana
maangane vaale ko jhidakee na dena
aur apane paravaradigaar kee neamaton ka zikr karate rahana
(ai rasool) kya hamane tumhaara seena ilm se kushaada nahin kar diya (jaroor kiya)
aur tum par se vah bojh utaar diya
jisane tumhaaree kamar tod rakhee thee
aur tumhaara zikr bhee buland kar diya
to (haan) pas beshak dushavaaree ke saath hee aasaanee hai
yaqeenan dushvaaree ke saath aasaanee hai
to jab tum phaarig ho jao to muqarrar kar do
aur phir apane paravaradigaar kee taraph ragabat karo
injeer aur zaitoon kee qasam
aur toor seeneen kee
aur us aman vaale shahar (makka) kee
ki hamane insaan bahut achchhe kaide ka paida kiya
phir hamane use (boodha karake raphta raphta) past se past haalat kee taraph pher diya
magar jo log eemaan lae aur achchhe (achchhe) kaam karate rahe unake lie to be inteha ajr va savaab hai
to (ai rasool) in daleelon ke baad tumako (roze) jaza ke baare mein kaun jhuthala sakata hai
kya khuda sabase bada haakim nahin hai (haan zaroor hai)
(ai rasool) apane paravaradigaar ka naam lekar padho jisane har (cheez ko) paida kiya
us ne insaan ko jame hue khoon se paida kiya padho
aur tumhaara paravaradigaar bada qareem hai
jisane qalam ke zarie taaleem dee
useene insaan ko vah baaten bataayeen jinako vah kuchh jaanata hee na tha
sun rakho beshak insaan jo apane ko ganee dekhata hai
to sarakash ho jaata hai
beshak tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraph (sabako) palatana hai
bhala tumane us shakhsh ko bhee dekha
jo ek bande ko jab vah namaaz padhata hai to vah rokata hai
bhala dekho to ki agar ye raahe raast par ho ya parahezagaaree ka hukm kare
to rokana kaisa
bhala dekho to ki agar usane (sachche ko) jhuthala diya aur (usane) munh phera
(to nateeja kya hoga) kya usako ye maaloom nahin ki khuda yaqeenan dekh raha hai
dekho agar vah baaz na aaega to ham pareshaanee ke patte pakad ke ghaseetenge
jhoothe khataavaar kee peshaanee ke patte
to vah apane yaaraane jalasa ko bulae ham bhee jallaad farishte ko bulaenge
(ai rasool) dekho haragiz unaka kahana na maanana
aur sajade karate raho aur kurb haasil karo (19) (sajada)
hamane (is kuraan) ko shabe qadr mein naazil (karana shuroo) kiya
aur tumako kya maaloom shabe qadr kya hai
shabe qadr (marataba aur amal mein) hazaar maheeno se behatar hai
is (raat) mein farishte aur jibareel (saal bhar kee) har baat ka hukm lekar apane paravaradigaar ke hukm se naazil hote hain
ye raat subah ke tuloo hone tak (azasarataapa) salaamatee hai
ahale kitaab aur musharikon se jo log kaaphir the jab tak ki unake paas khulee huee daleelen na pahunche vah (apane kuphr se) baaz aane vaale na the
(yaani) khuda ke rasool jo paak auraaq padhate hain (aae aur)
unamen (jo) purazor aur daroost baaten likhee huee hain (sunaaye)
ahale kitaab mutaafarriq hue bhee to jab unake paas khulee huee daleel aa chukee

(tab) aur unhen to bas ye hukm diya gaya tha ki nira khura usee ka etaqaad rakh ke baatil se katara ke khuda kee ibaadat kare aur paabandee se namaaz padhe aur zakaat ada karata rahe aur yahee sachcha deen hai
beshak ahale kitaab aur musharekeen se jo log (ab tak) kaafir hain vah dozakh kee aag mein (honge) hamesha usee mein rahenge yahee log badatareen khalaeq hain
beshak jo log eemaan lae aur achchhe kaam karate rahe yahee log behatareen khalaeq hain

unakee jaza unake paravaradigaar ke yahaan hamesha rahane (sahane) ke baag hain jinake neeche naharen jaaree hain aur vah aabaadul aabaad hamesha usee mein rahenge khuda unase raazee aur vah khuda se khush ye (jaza) khaas us shakhsh kee hai jo apane paravaradigaar se dare
jab zameen bade zoron ke saath zalazale mein aa jaegee
aur zameen apane andar ke bojhe (maadanayaat murde vagairah) nikaal daalegee
aur ek insaan kahega ki usako kya ho gaya hai
us roz vah apane sab haalaat bayaan kar degee
kyonki tumhaare paravaradigaar ne usako hukm diya hoga
us din log giroh giroh (apanee kabron se) nikalenge taaki apane aamaal ko dekhe
to jis shakhs ne zarra baraabar nekee kee vah use dekh lega
aur jis shakhs ne zarra baraabar badee kee hai to use dekh lega
(gaaziyon ke) sarapat daudane vaale ghodo kee qasam
jo nathanon se fararaate lete hain
phir patthar par taap maarakar chingaariyaan nikaalate hain phir subah ko chhaapa maarate hain
(to daud dhoop se) buland kar dete hain
phir us vakt (dushman ke) dil mein ghus jaate hain
(garaz qasam hai) ki beshak insaan apane paravaradigaar ka naashukra hai
aur yaqeenee khuda bhee usase vaaqif hai
aur beshak vah maal ka sakht harees hai
to kya vah ye nahin jaanata ki jab murde qabron se nikaale jaenge
aur dilon ke bhed zaahir kar die jaenge
beshak us din unaka paravaradigaar unase khoob vaaqif hoga
khadakhadaane vaalee
vah khadakhadaane vaalee kya hai
aur tum ko kya maaloom ki vah khadakhadaane vaalee kya hai
jis din log (maidaane hashr mein) tiddiyon kee tarah phaile honge
aur pahaad dhunakee huee rooee ke se ho jaenge
to jisake (nek aamaal) ke palle bhaaree honge
vah man bhaate aish mein honge
aur jinake aamaal ke palle halke honge
to unaka thikaana na raha
aur tumako kya maaloom haaviya kya hai
vah dahakatee huee aag hai
kul va maal kee bahutaayat ne tum logon ko gaafil rakha
yahaan tak ki tum logon ne kabren dekhee (mar gae)
dekho tumako anaqareeb hee maalum ho jaega
phir dekho tumhen anaqareeb hee maaloom ho jaega
dekho agar tumako yaqeenee taur par maaloom hota (to haragiz gaaphil na hote)
tum log zaroor dozakh ko dekhoge
phir tum log yaqeenee dekhana dekhoge
phir tumase neamaton ke baaren zaroor baaz purs kee jaegee
namaaze asr kee qasam
beshak insaan ghaate mein hai
magar jo log eemaan lae, aur achchhe kaam karate rahe aur aapas mein haq ka hukm aur sabr kee vaseeyat karate rahe
har taana dene vaale chugalakhor kee kharaabee hai
jo maal ko jama karata hai aur gin gin kar rakhata hai
vah samajhata hai ki usaka maal use hamesha zinda baaqee rakhega
haragiz nahin vah to zaroor hutama mein daala jaega
aur tumako kya maaloom hatama kya hai
vah khuda kee bhadakaee huee aag hai jo (talave se lagee to) dilon tak chadh jaegee
ye log aag ke lambe sutoono
mein daal kar band kar die
jaenge
ai rasool kya tumane nahin dekha ki tumhaare paravaradigaar ne haathee vaalon ke saath kya kiya
kya usane unakee tamaam tadbeeren galat nahin kar deen (zaroor)
aur un par jhund kee jhund chidiyaan bhej deen
jo un par kharanjon kee kankariyaan phekatee theen
to unhen chabae hue bhoos kee (tabaah) kar diya
choonki quraish ko jaade aur garmee ke safar se maanoos kar diya hai
to unako maanoos kar dene kee vajah se
is ghar (kaaba) ke maalik kee ibaadat karanee chaahie
jisane unako bhookh mein khaana diya aur unako khauf se aman ata kiya
kya tumane us shakhsh ko bhee dekha hai jo roz jaza ko jhuthalaata hai
ye to vahee (kambakht) hai jo yateem ko dhakke deta hai
aur mohataajon ko khilaane ke lie (logon ko) aamaada nahin karata
to un namaaziyon kee tabaahee hai
jo apanee namaaz se gaaphil rahate hain
jo dikhaane ke vaaste karate hain
aur rozamarra kee maaloolee cheezen bhee aariyat nahin dete
(ai rasool) hamanen tumako ko kausar ata kiya
to tum apane paravaradigaar kee namaaz padha karo
aur qurbaanee diya karo beshak tumhaara dushman be aulaad rahega
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki ai kaaphiron
tum jin cheezon ko poojate ho, main unako nahin poojata
aur jis (khuda) kee main ibaadat karata hoon usakee tum ibaadat nahin karate
aur jinhen tum poojate ho main unaka poojane vaala nahin
aur jisakee main ibaadat karata hoon usakee tum ibaadat karane vaale nahin
tumhaare lie tumhaara deen mere lie mera deen
ai rasool jab khuda kee madad aa pahanchegee
aur phateh (makka) ho jaegee aur tum logon ko dekhoge ki gol ke gol khuda ke deen mein daakhil ho rahe hain
to tum apane paravaradigaar kee taareef ke saath tasabeeh karana aur usee se magapherat kee dua maangana vah beshak bada maaf karane vaala hai
abu lahab ke haath toot jaen aur vah khud satyaanaas ho jae
(aakhir) na usaka maal hee usake haath aaya aur (na) usane kamaaya
vah bahut bhadakatee huee aag mein daakhil hoga
aur usakee joroo bhee jo sar par eendhan uthae phiratee hai
aur usake gale mein batee huee rassee bandhee hai
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki khuda ek hai
khuda barahaq beniyaaz hai
na usane kisee ko jana na usako kisee ne jana
aur usaka koee hamasar nahin
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki main subah ke maalik kee
har cheez kee buraee se jo usane paida kee panaah maangata hoon
aur andhereeraat kee buraee se jab usaka andhera chha jae
aur gandon par phoonkane vaaliyon kee buraee se
(jab phoonke) aur hasad karane vaale kee buraee se
(ai rasool) tum kah do main logon ke paravaradigaar
logon ke baadashaah
logon ke maabood kee (shaitaanee)
vasavase kee buraee se panaah maangata hoon
jo (khuda ke naam se) peechhe hat jaata hai jo logon ke dilon mein vasavase daala karata hai
jinnaat mein se khvaah aadamiyon mein se
